metadata.title: Wednesday, 18th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a)    what the progress is on the revocation of Statutory Instrument No. 29 of 2015, in which Mr Josiah L M Nyumbu was recognised as Chief Chiyengele of the Mbunda people in Mongu District even when the matter was before the High Court; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to promote harmony between the Mbunda people and the Litunga.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Natural Resources  and Environmental Protection
parts: (a)    when squatters in the following Forestry Reserves in Kapiri Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency will be relocated:
(i)    Chibwe National; (ii)    Luembe National; (iii)    Kapiri Mposhi; and (iv)    Ipumba Local;
(b)    whether alternative land for resettling the squatters has already been found; and
(c)    if so, where this land is.
(a)    how many cases of theft of fertilizer under the Farmer Input Support Programme were reported during the 2014/15 planting season, countrywide;
(b)    how many districts were affected by the thefts;
(c)    how much money, in total, was involved;
(d)    how many suspects were involved; and

(e)    what disciplinary action has been taken against staff who were involved in the cases. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 62/01: under consideration): (The Minister of Energy and Water Development). Heads 62/02, 62/03, 62/04, 80/5501, 80/5502, 80/5503, 80/5505, 80/5508, 44/01, 44/02, 44/03, 44/04, 44/05, 44/06, 76/01, 76/02, 76/03, 76/04 and 78/01 - for consideration.
